alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 23 at 5:07AM MST until March 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE HAVASU CREEK BASIN REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST/1 PM MDT/ TODAY FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 506 AM MST /606 AM MDT/, river gauges continued to show rapid rises along Cataract Creek upstream of the Havasu Creek basin. Flash flooding is already occurring and is expected to reach Supai between 4 AM and 7 AM MST /5 AM and 8 AM MDT/. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Upstream heavy rain and snowmelt producing flash flooding in and around the Havasu Creek basin. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Havasu Creek basin. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Havasupai Reservation and Supai. This includes the following swimming holes... All swimming holes on Havasu Creek near Supai. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Havasu Creek. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Residents, campers, and hikers should hustle to higher ground immediately! Stay away from creeks and washes! Travel throughout Supai Village will be limited. Homes...property... and roadways near Havasu Creek in Supai Village will be flooded. Much of Supai Campground will likely be inundated.
